snippet: Dell’s huge deal for the data storage and software company EMC has many supporters, despite the firm’s recent financial performance.
abstract: News Analysis; Dell's financial performance and footing has weakened over past several months, which could put at risk its huge $67 billion deal to buy data storage company EMC; supporters contend two merged firms will be more nimble.
lead_paragraph: Dell’s huge deal for the data storage and software company EMC has many supporters, despite the firm’s recent financial performance.

headline.print_headline: Recent Weakness at Dell Could Increase Risks of Huge EMC Deal
headline.main: How Dell’s Weak Performance Could Affect Its $67 Billion EMC Deal
